metadata.name: DumpStack.log Defender Evasion
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the filename DumpStack.log to evade Microsoft Defender

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\dumpstack.log')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -o dumpstack.log'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of the filename DumpStack.log to evade Microsoft Defender
